title: Vayne needs to beat Warwick and Vladimir
body:
Vayne's silver bolts should 1 shot Warwick and Vladimir since they're both vampires/werewolves.

It makes sense.

Riot please add this to the next patch.  

Thank you.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Alpha samsuni,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gk2GUw4B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-18T02:00:00.466+0000)
>
> Yea, because *%^# balance!
> http://ww2.kqed.org/pop/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2016/08/latrice-really-gif.gif

Balance?  What is balanced about Warwicks no skill press R to win free lockdown death sentence ultimate?  He needs a counterpick and Vayne is just up that alley.

Yeah, because who needs to actually learn how to counter warwick like bad pre-6, grievous wounds, ignite, hard cc, knockback / knockup, and lack of mobility? Just make a complete counter that literally one-shots the champion!

http://www.abc.net.au/triplej/breakfast/img/stories/20141124_mind_blown_meme_450.jpg
Vladimir is not a vampire though
I like WW a lot more than Vlad, and Vlad a lot more than Vayne, but I up voted you because I like folklore
